titleStmt.title: The royal-pay and pay-master, or, The indigent-officers comfort delivered in a sermon preached before the honorable the military company at St. Pauls Covent-Garden, July 25th, by William Sclater ... ; and now printed at their earnest intreaty.
titleStmt.author: Sclater, William, d. 1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Rich. Hodgkinson, and are to be sold by E. Brewster ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
